name: Woodland Samurai
description:
Woodland Samurai is a small strategy game, where you lead an army of samurai against an AI opponent! Your goal is to either capture the opponent's castle or defeat all their samurai.

To win you must use the terrain to your advantage and recruit samurai in neutral towns before the enemy can. Towns can also be used to reinforce your existing samurai.

This game was made for the Sockpop Game Jam. Its mechanics are inspired by Woodland Saga and the theme is inspired by Hour of the Rat. 


Controls

  • Camera Rotate: A, D
  • Camera Zoom in/out: W, S
  • Do things: LMB
